description: Try our easy to follow Red Papaya & Passionfruit Mille-Feuille recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pastries,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Red Papaya & Passionfruit Mille-Feuille Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheet butter puff pastry, partially thawed
1 red papaya, peeled, deseeded and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Grease 2 large baking trays.
Cut each pastry sheet into 6 rectangular pieces. Place onto prepared trays. Prick all over with a fork. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
Place a pastry piece onto each serving plate. Spread each with about 2 tablespoons of custard. Top with papaya slices and spoon over passionfruit pulp. Repeat. Finish with a pastry top.
